text.section:
The Governor's Office of Crime Control and Prevention shall:
adopt regulations for the administration and award of grants under Part II of this subtitle; and
submit all approved grant applications to the Board.

The Board shall:
approve each grant application received by the Governor's Office of Crime Control and Prevention before any money is released from the Fund;
ensure that the money obtained from unclaimed restitution under § 17-317(a)(3)(i) of the Commercial Law Article is used for annual grants to provide legal counsel to victims of crimes and delinquent acts to protect the victims' rights as provided by law; and
ensure that grants to child advocacy centers established under § 11-923(h) of this subtitle shall:
support the development and operation of child advocacy centers; and
supplement and not supplant money that the child advocacy centers receive from other sources.
